content.rendered:
“Even if you don’t want, society will throw problems at you. So why are you running away instead of facing them? Difficult situations are not really curses, they are blessings.”

This book is a repository of many such suggestions by Sadhguru.

excerpt.rendered: “Even if you don’t want, society will throw problems at you. So why are you running away instead of facing them? Difficult situations are not really curses, they are blessings.” This book is a repository of many such suggestions by Sadhguru.
